review: I have two of these sticks now on two different tvs in different homes.  This is my second one, and for whatever reason it's not as good as the first one I bought.  Waking it up takes up to 5 minutes sometimes, and then once I do get it out of "screen saver mode" it takes another couple of minutes or a few too many frustrated taps of the arrow buttons on the remote to get things going.  Once it does, everything's fine.

review: I really like it but it sometimes disconnects on its own.  If you're setting up use your computer not a tablet.  Roku didn't recognize the setup code from a phone or tablet.  The on phone help sorted it out though. I have had to reset the remote twice now in just a few days.  Once it's connected it's great!
